185 class user_turn
186 {
187 
188  private:
189  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> user_turn_start;
190  public:
191  user_turn() {
192  user_turn_start = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
193  }
194 
195  bool has_timeout_elapsed() {
196  return moves_elapsed() > 100;
197  }
198 
199  int moves_elapsed() {
200  const float turn_duration = get_option<float>( "TURN_DURATION" );
201  // Magic number 0.005 chosen due to option menu's 2 digit precision and
202  // the option menu UI rounding <= 0.005 down to "0.00" in the display.
203  // This conditional will catch values (e.g. 0.003) that the options menu
204  // would round down to "0.00" in the options menu display. This prevents
205  // the user from being surprised by floating point rounding near zero.
206  if( turn_duration <= 0.005 ) {
207  return 0;
208  }
209  std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point now = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
210  std::chrono::milliseconds elapsed_ms =
211  std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>( now - user_turn_start );
212  return elapsed_ms.count() / ( 10.0 * turn_duration );
213  }
214 
215  bool async_anim_timeout() {
216  std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point now = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
217  std::chrono::milliseconds elapsed_ms =
218  std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>( now - user_turn_start );
219  return elapsed_ms.count() > get_option<int>( "ANIMATION_DELAY" );
220  }
221 
222  std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point last_blink_transition = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
223  bool blink_timeout() {
224  std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point now = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
225  std::chrono::milliseconds elapsed_ms =
226  std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>( now - last_blink_transition );
227  if( elapsed_ms.count() > get_option<int>( "BLINK_SPEED" ) ) {
228  last_blink_transition = now;
229  return true;
230  }
231  return false;
232  }
233 
234 };

236 input_context game::get_player_input( std::string &action )
237 {
238  input_context ctxt;
239  if( uquit == QUIT_WATCH ) {
240  ctxt = input_context( "DEFAULTMODE", keyboard_mode::keycode );
241  ctxt.set_iso( true );
242  // The list of allowed actions in death-cam mode in game::handle_action
243  // *INDENT-OFF*
244  for( const action_id id : {
245  ACTION_TOGGLE_MAP_MEMORY,
246  ACTION_CENTER,
247  ACTION_SHIFT_N,
248  ACTION_SHIFT_NE,
249  ACTION_SHIFT_E,
250  ACTION_SHIFT_SE,
251  ACTION_SHIFT_S,
252  ACTION_SHIFT_SW,
253  ACTION_SHIFT_W,
254  ACTION_SHIFT_NW,
255  ACTION_LOOK,
256  ACTION_KEYBINDINGS,
257  } ) {
258  ctxt.register_action( action_ident( id ) );
259  }
260  // *INDENT-ON*
261  ctxt.register_action( "QUIT", to_translation( "Accept your fate" ) );
262  } else {
263  ctxt = get_default_mode_input_context();
264  }
265 
266  m.update_visibility_cache( u.posz() );
267  const visibility_variables &cache = m.get_visibility_variables_cache();
268  const level_cache &map_cache = m.get_cache_ref( u.posz() );
269  const auto &visibility_cache = map_cache.visibility_cache;
270 #if defined(TILES)
271  // Mark cata_tiles draw caches as dirty
272  tilecontext->set_draw_cache_dirty();
273 #endif
274 
275  user_turn current_turn;
276 
277  if( get_option<bool>( "ANIMATIONS" ) ) {
278  const int TOTAL_VIEW = MAX_VIEW_DISTANCE * 2 + 1;
279  point iStart( ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH > TOTAL_VIEW ) ? ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH - TOTAL_VIEW ) / 2 : 0,
280  ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT > TOTAL_VIEW ) ? ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT - TOTAL_VIEW ) / 2 :
281  0 );
282  point iEnd( ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH > TOTAL_VIEW ) ? TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH -
283  ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH - TOTAL_VIEW ) /
284  2 :
285  TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH, ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT > TOTAL_VIEW ) ? TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT -
286  ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT - TOTAL_VIEW ) /
287  2 : TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT );
288 
289  if( fullscreen ) {
290  iStart.x = 0;
291  iStart.y = 0;
292  iEnd.x = TERMX;
293  iEnd.y = TERMY;
294  }
295 
296  //x% of the Viewport, only shown on visible areas
297  const weather_animation_t weather_info = weather.weather_id->weather_animation;
298  point offset( u.view_offset.xy() + point( -getmaxx( w_terrain ) / 2 + u.posx(),
299  -getmaxy( w_terrain ) / 2 + u.posy() ) );
300 
301 #if defined(TILES)
302  if( g->is_tileset_isometric() ) {
303  iStart.x = 0;
304  iStart.y = 0;
305  iEnd.x = MAPSIZE_X;
306  iEnd.y = MAPSIZE_Y;
307  offset.x = 0;
308  offset.y = 0;
309  }
310 #endif //TILES
311 
312  // TODO: Move the weather calculations out of here.
313  const bool bWeatherEffect = weather_info.symbol != NULL_UNICODE;
314  const int dropCount = static_cast<int>( iEnd.x * iEnd.y * weather_info.factor );
315 
316  weather_printable wPrint;
317  wPrint.colGlyph = weather_info.color;
318  wPrint.cGlyph = weather_info.symbol;
319  wPrint.wtype = weather.weather_id;
320  wPrint.vdrops.clear();
321 
322  ctxt.set_timeout( 125 );
323 
324  shared_ptr_fast<game::draw_callback_t> animation_cb =
325  make_shared_fast<game::draw_callback_t>( [&]() {
326  draw_weather( wPrint );
327 
328  if( uquit != QUIT_WATCH ) {
329  draw_sct();
330  }
331  } );
332  add_draw_callback( animation_cb );
333 
334  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
335  do {
336  if( bWeatherEffect && get_option<bool>( "ANIMATION_RAIN" ) ) {
337  /*
338  Location to add rain drop animation bits! Since it refreshes w_terrain it can be added to the animation section easily
339  Get tile information from above's weather information:
340  WEATHER_DRIZZLE | WEATHER_LIGHT_DRIZZLE | WEATHER_RAINY | WEATHER_RAINSTORM | WEATHER_THUNDER | WEATHER_LIGHTNING = "weather_rain_drop"
341  WEATHER_FLURRIES | WEATHER_SNOW | WEATHER_SNOWSTORM = "weather_snowflake"
342  */
343  invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
344 
345  wPrint.vdrops.clear();
346 
347  for( int i = 0; i < dropCount; i++ ) {
348  const point iRand( rng( iStart.x, iEnd.x - 1 ), rng( iStart.y, iEnd.y - 1 ) );
349  const point map( iRand + offset );
350 
351  const tripoint mapp( map, u.posz() );
352 
353  if( m.inbounds( mapp ) && m.is_outside( mapp ) &&
354  m.get_visibility( visibility_cache[mapp.x][mapp.y], cache ) ==
355  visibility_type::CLEAR &&
356  !creatures.creature_at( mapp, true ) ) {
357  // Suppress if a critter is there
358  wPrint.vdrops.emplace_back( iRand.x, iRand.y );
359  }
360  }
361  }
362  // don't bother calculating SCT if we won't show it
363  if( uquit != QUIT_WATCH && get_option<bool>( "ANIMATION_SCT" ) && !SCT.vSCT.empty() ) {
364  invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
365 
366  SCT.advanceAllSteps();
367 
368  //Check for creatures on all drawing positions and offset if necessary
369  for( auto iter = SCT.vSCT.rbegin(); iter != SCT.vSCT.rend(); ++iter ) {
370  const direction oCurDir = iter->getDirection();
371  const int width = utf8_width( iter->getText() );
372  for( int i = 0; i < width; ++i ) {
373  tripoint tmp( iter->getPosX() + i, iter->getPosY(), get_map().get_abs_sub().z() );
374  const Creature *critter = creatures.creature_at( tmp, true );
375 
376  if( critter != nullptr && u.sees( *critter ) ) {
377  i = -1;
378  int iPos = iter->getStep() + iter->getStepOffset();
379  for( auto iter2 = iter; iter2 != SCT.vSCT.rend(); ++iter2 ) {
380  if( iter2->getDirection() == oCurDir &&
381  iter2->getStep() + iter2->getStepOffset() <= iPos ) {
382  if( iter2->getType() == "hp" ) {
383  iter2->advanceStepOffset();
384  }
385 
386  iter2->advanceStepOffset();
387  iPos = iter2->getStep() + iter2->getStepOffset();
388  }
389  }
390  }
391  }
392  }
393  }
394 
395  if( pixel_minimap_option ) {
396  // TODO: more granular control to only redraw pixel minimap
397  invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
398  }
399 
400  std::unique_ptr<static_popup> deathcam_msg_popup;
401  if( uquit == QUIT_WATCH ) {
402  deathcam_msg_popup = std::make_unique<static_popup>();
403  deathcam_msg_popup
404  ->wait_message( c_red, _( "Press %s to accept your fate…" ), ctxt.get_desc( "QUIT" ) )
405  .on_top( true );
406  }
407 
408  // Remove asynchronous animations after animation delay if no input
409  if( current_turn.async_anim_timeout() ) {
410  g->void_async_anim_curses();
411 #if defined(TILES)
412  tilecontext->void_async_anim();
413 #else
414  // Curses does not redraw itself so do it here
415  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
416 #endif
417  }
418 
419  if( g->has_blink_curses() && current_turn.blink_timeout() ) {
420  // Toggle blink phase and redraw
421  g->blink_active_phase = !g->blink_active_phase;
422  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
423  }
424 
425  ui_manager::redraw_invalidated();
426  } while( handle_mouseview( ctxt, action ) && uquit != QUIT_WATCH
427  && ( action != "TIMEOUT" || !current_turn.has_timeout_elapsed() ) );
428  ctxt.reset_timeout();
429  } else {
430  ctxt.set_timeout( 125 );
431  while( handle_mouseview( ctxt, action ) ) {
432  if( action == "TIMEOUT" && current_turn.has_timeout_elapsed() ) {
433  break;
434  }
435  }
436  ctxt.reset_timeout();
437  }
438 
439  return ctxt;
440 }

442 static void rcdrive( const point &d )
443 {
444  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
445  map &here = get_map();
446  std::stringstream car_location_string( player_character.get_value( "remote_controlling" ) );
447 
448  if( car_location_string.str().empty() ) {
449  //no turned radio car found
450  add_msg( m_warning, _( "No radio car connected." ) );
451  return;
452  }
453  tripoint c;
454  car_location_string >> c.x >> c.y >> c.z;
455 
456  auto rc_pairs = here.get_rc_items( c );
457  auto rc_pair = rc_pairs.begin();
458  for( ; rc_pair != rc_pairs.end(); ++rc_pair ) {
459  if( rc_pair->second->has_flag( flag_RADIOCAR ) && rc_pair->second->active ) {
460  break;
461  }
462  }
463  if( rc_pair == rc_pairs.end() ) {
464  add_msg( m_warning, _( "No radio car connected." ) );
465  player_character.remove_value( "remote_controlling" );
466  return;
467  }
468  item *rc_car = rc_pair->second;
469 
470  tripoint dest( c + d );
471  if( here.impassable( dest ) || !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( dest ) ||
472  here.has_furn( dest ) ) {
473  sounds::sound( dest, 7, sounds::sound_t::combat,
474  _( "sound of a collision with an obstacle." ), true, "misc", "rc_car_hits_obstacle" );
475  return;
476  } else if( !here.add_item_or_charges( dest, *rc_car ).is_null() ) {
477  tripoint src( c );
478  //~ Sound of moving a remote controlled car
479  sounds::sound( src, 6, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "zzz…" ), true, "misc", "rc_car_drives" );
480  player_character.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.5 );
481  here.i_rem( src, rc_car );
482  car_location_string.clear();
483  car_location_string << dest.x << ' ' << dest.y << ' ' << dest.z;
484  player_character.set_value( "remote_controlling", car_location_string.str() );
485  return;
486  }
487 }
488 
489 static void pldrive( const tripoint &p )
490 {
491  if( !g->check_safe_mode_allowed() ) {
492  return;
493  }
494  vehicle *veh = g->remoteveh();
495  bool remote = true;
496  int part = -1;
497  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
498  map &here = get_map();
499  if( !veh ) {
500  if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( player_character.pos() ) ) {
501  veh = &vp->vehicle();
502  part = vp->part_index();
503  }
504  remote = false;
505  }
506  if( !veh ) {
507  dbg( D_ERROR ) << "game::pldrive: can't find vehicle! Drive mode is now off.";
508  debugmsg( "game::pldrive error: can't find vehicle! Drive mode is now off." );
509  player_character.in_vehicle = false;
510  return;
511  }
512  if( veh->is_on_ramp && p.x != 0 ) {
513  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You can't turn the vehicle while on a ramp." ) );
514  return;
515  }
516  if( !remote ) {
517  const vehicle_part &vp = veh->part( part );
518  const bool has_animal_controls = veh->part_with_feature( vp.mount, "CONTROL_ANIMAL", true ) >= 0;
519  const bool has_controls = veh->part_with_feature( vp.mount, "CONTROLS", true ) >= 0;
520  const bool has_animal = veh->has_engine_type( fuel_type_animal, false ) &&
521  veh->get_harnessed_animal();
522  if( !has_controls && !has_animal_controls ) {
523  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't drive the vehicle from here. You need controls!" ) );
524  player_character.controlling_vehicle = false;
525  return;
526  } else if( !has_controls && has_animal_controls && !has_animal ) {
527  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't drive this vehicle without an animal to pull it." ) );
528  player_character.controlling_vehicle = false;
529  return;
530  }
531  } else {
532  if( empty( veh->get_avail_parts( "REMOTE_CONTROLS" ) ) ) {
533  add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't drive this vehicle remotely. It has no working controls." ) );
534  return;
535  }
536  }
537  if( p.z != 0 ) {
538  if( !veh->can_control_in_air( player_character ) ) {
539  player_character.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have no idea how to make the vehicle fly." ) );
540  return;
541  }
542  if( !veh->is_flyable() ) {
543  player_character.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This vehicle doesn't look very airworthy." ) );
544  return;
545  }
546  }
547  if( p.z == -1 ) {
548  if( veh->check_heli_descend( player_character ) ) {
549  player_character.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You steer the vehicle into a descent." ) );
550  } else {
551  return;
552  }
553  } else if( p.z == 1 ) {
554  if( veh->check_heli_ascend( player_character ) ) {
555  player_character.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You steer the vehicle into an ascent." ) );
556  } else {
557  return;
558  }
559  }
560  if( !veh->is_flying_in_air() ) {
561  if( !veh->can_control_on_land( player_character ) ) {
562  player_character.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have no idea how to make the vehicle move." ) );
563  return;
564  }
565  }
566  veh->pldrive( get_avatar(), p.xy(), p.z );
567 }
568 
569 static void pldrive( point d )
570 {
571  return pldrive( tripoint( d, 0 ) );
572 }
573 
574 static void open()
575 {
576  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
577  const std::optional<tripoint> openp_ = choose_adjacent_highlight( _( "Open where?" ),
578  pgettext( "no door, gate, curtain, etc.", "There is nothing that can be opened nearby." ),
579  ACTION_OPEN, false );
580 
581  if( !openp_ ) {
582  return;
583  }
584  const tripoint openp = *openp_;
585  map &here = get_map();
586 
587  player_character.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
588 
589  // Is a vehicle part here?
590  if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( openp ) ) {
591  vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
592  // Check for potential thievery, and restore moves if action is canceled
593  if( !veh->handle_potential_theft( player_character ) ) {
594  player_character.mod_moves( to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
595  return;
596  }
597  // Check if vehicle has a part here that can be opened
598  int openable = veh->next_part_to_open( vp->part_index() );
599  if( openable >= 0 ) {
600  // If player is inside vehicle, open the door/window/curtain
601  const vehicle *player_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( player_character.pos() ) );
602  const std::string part_name = veh->part( openable ).name();
603  bool outside = !player_veh || player_veh != veh;
604  if( !outside ) {
605  veh->open( openable );
606  //~ %1$s - vehicle name, %2$s - part name
607  player_character.add_msg_if_player( _( "You open the %1$s's %2$s." ), veh->name, part_name );
608  } else {
609  // Outside means we check if there's anything in that tile outside-openable.
610  // If there is, we open everything on tile. This means opening a closed,
611  // curtained door from outside is possible, but it will magically open the
612  // curtains as well.
613  int outside_openable = veh->next_part_to_open( vp->part_index(), true );
614  if( outside_openable == -1 ) {
615  add_msg( m_info, _( "That %s can only be opened from the inside." ), part_name );
616  player_character.mod_moves( to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
617  } else {
618  veh->open_all_at( openable );
619  //~ %1$s - vehicle name, %2$s - part name
620  player_character.add_msg_if_player( _( "You open the %1$s's %2$s." ), veh->name, part_name );
621  }
622  }
623  } else {
624  // If there are any OPENABLE parts here, they must be already open or locked
625  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> openable_part = vp.part_with_feature( "OPENABLE",
626  true ); openable_part.has_value() ) {
627  const std::string name = openable_part->info().name();
628  if( vp->vehicle().part( openable_part->part_index() ).locked ) {
629  add_msg( m_info, _( "That %s is locked." ), name );
630  } else {
631  add_msg( m_info, _( "That %s is already open." ), name );
632  }
633  }
634  player_character.mod_moves( to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
635  }
636  return;
637  }
638  // Not a vehicle part, just a regular door
639  bool didit = here.open_door( player_character, openp, !here.is_outside( player_character.pos() ) );
640  if( didit ) {
641  player_character.add_msg_if_player( _( "You open the %s." ), here.name( openp ) );
642  } else {
643  const ter_str_id tid = here.ter( openp ).id();
644 
645  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LOCKED, openp ) ) {
646  add_msg( m_info, _( "The door is locked!" ) );
647  return;
648  } else if( tid.obj().close ) {
649  // if the following message appears unexpectedly, the prior check was for t_door_o
650  add_msg( m_info, _( "That door is already open." ) );
651  player_character.mod_moves( to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
652  return;
653  }
654  add_msg( m_info, _( "No door there." ) );
655  player_character.mod_moves( to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
656  }
657 }
658 
659 static void close()
660 {
661  if( const std::optional<tripoint_bub_ms> pnt = choose_adjacent_highlight_bub_ms(
662  _( "Close where?" ),
663  pgettext( "no door, gate, etc.", "There is nothing that can be closed nearby." ),
664  ACTION_CLOSE, false ) ) {
665  doors::close_door( get_map(), get_player_character(), *pnt );
666  }
667 }

669 // Establish or release a grab on a vehicle
670 static void grab()
671 {
672  avatar &you = get_avatar();
673  map &here = get_map();
674 
675  if( you.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
676  if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( you.pos() + you.grab_point ) ) {
677  add_msg( _( "You release the %s." ), vp->vehicle().name );
678  } else if( here.has_furn( you.pos() + you.grab_point ) ) {
679  add_msg( _( "You release the %s." ), here.furnname( you.pos() + you.grab_point ) );
680  }
681 
682  you.grab( object_type::NONE );
683  return;
684  }
685 
686  const std::optional<tripoint> grabp_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Grab where?" ) );
687  if( !grabp_ ) {
688  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
689  return;
690  }
691  tripoint grabp = *grabp_;
692 
693  if( grabp == you.pos() ) {
694  add_msg( _( "You get a hold of yourself." ) );
695  you.grab( object_type::NONE );
696  return;
697  }
698 
699  // Object might not be on the same z level if on a ramp.
700  if( !( here.veh_at( grabp ) || here.has_furn( grabp ) ) ) {
701  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP, grabp ) ||
702  here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP, you.pos() ) ) {
703  grabp.z += 1;
704  } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN, grabp ) ||
705  here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN, you.pos() ) ) {
706  grabp.z -= 1;
707  }
708  }
709 
710  if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( grabp ) ) {
711  std::string veh_name = vp->vehicle().name;
712  if( !vp->vehicle().handle_potential_theft( you ) ) {
713  return;
714  }
715  if( vp.part_with_feature( VPFLAG_WALL_MOUNTED, false ) ) {
716  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't move that, it's attached to the wall." ) );
717  return;
718  }
719  // Powergrids with more than one part are undraggable.
720  // Offer to split the targeted part off onto its own, making it draggable.
721  if( vp->vehicle().is_powergrid() && vp->vehicle().part_count() > 1 ) {
722  if( !query_yn(
723  _( "That's part of a power grid. Separate it from the grid so you can move it?" ) ) ) {
724  return;
725  }
726  get_player_character().pause();
727  vp->vehicle().separate_from_grid( vp.value().mount() );
728  if( const optional_vpart_position split_vp = here.veh_at( grabp ) ) {
729  veh_name = split_vp->vehicle().name;
730  } else {
731  debugmsg( "Lost the part to drag after splitting power grid!" );
732  return;
733  }
734  }
735  you.grab( object_type::VEHICLE, grabp - you.pos() );
736  add_msg( _( "You grab the %s." ), veh_name );
737  } else if( here.has_furn( grabp ) ) { // If not, grab furniture if present
738  if( !here.furn( grabp ).obj().is_movable() ) {
739  add_msg( _( "You can not grab the %s." ), here.furnname( grabp ) );
740  return;
741  }
742  you.grab( object_type::FURNITURE, grabp - you.pos() );
743  if( !here.can_move_furniture( grabp, &you ) ) {
744  add_msg( _( "You grab the %s. It feels really heavy." ), here.furnname( grabp ) );
745  } else {
746  add_msg( _( "You grab the %s." ), here.furnname( grabp ) );
747  }
748  } else { // TODO: grab mob? Captured squirrel = pet (or meat that stays fresh longer).
749  add_msg( m_info, _( "There's nothing to grab there!" ) );
750  }
751 }
752 
753 static void haul()
754 {
755  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
756 
757  uilist menu;
758 
759  bool hauling = player_character.is_hauling();
760  bool autohaul = player_character.is_autohauling();
761  std::vector<item_location> &haul_list = player_character.haul_list;
762  std::vector<item_location> haulable_items = get_map().get_haulable_items( player_character.pos() );
763  int haul_qty = haul_list.size();
764  std::string &haul_filter = player_character.hauling_filter;
765 
766 
767  std::string help_header =
768  _( "Select items on current tile to haul with you as you move.\nIf autohaul is enabled, you will automatically add encountered items to the haul.\nYou can set a filter to limit which items are automatically added." );
769 
770  std::string status_header;
771  if( hauling && autohaul ) {
772  if( haul_qty == 0 ) {
773  status_header =
774  _( "You are currently not hauling any items, but autohaul is enabled, so any new items encountered on the ground will be hauled." );
775  } else {
776  status_header = string_format(
777  _( "You are currently hauling %d items.\nAutohaul is enabled, so any new items encountered on the ground will be hauled." ),
778  haul_qty );
779  }
780  }
781 
782  if( hauling && !autohaul ) {
783  if( haul_qty == 0 ) {
784  debugmsg( "Invalid hauling state: hauling enabled, nothing is being hauled, autohaul is off." );
785  } else {
786  status_header = string_format( _( "You are currently hauling %d items.\nAutohaul is disabled." ),
787  haul_qty );
788  }
789  }
790 
791  if( !hauling ) {
792  status_header =
793  _( "You are currently not hauling. Select items to haul or enable autohaul to start." );
794  }
795 
796  if( status_header.empty() ) {
797  debugmsg( "Failed to construct status header for haul interface" );
798  }
799 
800  status_header += haul_filter.empty() ? _( "\nAutohaul filter not set." ) : string_format(
801  _( "\nAutohaul filter: %s" ), haul_filter );
802 
803  menu.text = help_header + "\n\n" + status_header;
804 
805  input_context ctxt = get_default_mode_input_context();
806  std::vector<input_event> haul_keys = ctxt.keys_bound_to( "haul" );
807  int haul_key = haul_keys.empty() ? '\\' : haul_keys.front().sequence.front();
808 
809  menu.entries.emplace_back( 0, hauling, hauling ? haul_key : 'h', _( "Stop hauling" ) );
810  menu.entries.emplace_back( 1, !haulable_items.empty(), !hauling ? haul_key : 'h',
811  _( "Haul everything here" ) );
812  menu.entries.emplace_back( 2, !haulable_items.empty(), 'p', _( "Choose items to haul" ) );
813  menu.entries.emplace_back( 3, true, 'a',
814  autohaul ? _( "Disable autohaul" ) : _( "Enable autohaul" ) );
815  menu.entries.emplace_back( 4, true, 'f', _( "Edit autohaul filter" ) );
816  menu.entries.emplace_back( 9, true, 'c', _( "Cancel" ) );
817 
818  menu.query();
819 
820  switch( menu.ret ) {
821  case 0:
822  player_character.stop_hauling();
823  break;
824  case 1:
825  player_character.start_hauling( haulable_items );
826  break;
827  case 2: {
828  inventory_haul_selector selector( player_character );
829  selector.add_map_items( player_character.pos() );
830  selector.apply_selection( player_character.haul_list );
831  selector.set_title( _( "Select items to haul" ) );
832  selector.set_hint( _( "To select x items, type a number before selecting." ) );
833  drop_locations result = selector.execute( true );
834  haulable_items.clear();
835  for( const drop_location &dl : result ) {
836  haulable_items.push_back( dl.first );
837  }
838  if( haulable_items != player_character.haul_list ) {
839  player_character.suppress_autohaul = true;
840  }
841  player_character.start_hauling( haulable_items );
842  }
843  break;
844  case 3:
845  autohaul ? player_character.stop_autohaul() : player_character.start_autohaul();
846  break;
847  case 4:
848  string_input_popup()
849  .title( _( "Filter:" ) )
850  .width( 55 )
851  .description( item_filter_rule_string( item_filter_type::FILTER ) )
852  .desc_color( c_white )
853  .identifier( "item_filter" )
854  .max_length( 256 )
855  .edit( player_character.hauling_filter );
856  break;
857  case 9:
858  default:
859  break;
860  }
861 }
862 
863 static void haul_toggle()
864 {
865  get_avatar().toggle_hauling();
866 }
867 
868 static void smash()
869 {
870  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
871  map &here = get_map();
872  if( player_character.is_mounted() ) {
873  auto *mons = player_character.mounted_creature.get();
874  if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
875  if( !mons->check_mech_powered() ) {
876  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your %s refuses to move as its batteries have been drained." ),
877  mons->get_name() );
878  return;
879  }
880  }
881  }
882  const int move_cost = !player_character.is_armed() ? 80 :
883  player_character.get_wielded_item()->attack_time( player_character ) *
884  0.8;
885  bool mech_smash = false;
886  int smashskill = player_character.smash_ability();
887  if( player_character.is_mounted() ) {
888  mech_smash = true;
889  }
890 
891  const bool allow_floor_bash = debug_mode; // Should later become "true"
892  const std::optional<tripoint> smashp_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Smash where?" ), allow_floor_bash );
893  if( !smashp_ ) {
894  return;
895  }
896  tripoint smashp = *smashp_;
897 
898  bool smash_floor = false;
899  if( smashp.z != player_character.posz() ) {
900  if( smashp.z > player_character.posz() ) {
901  // TODO: Knock on the ceiling
902  return;
903  }
904 
905  smashp.z = player_character.posz();
906  smash_floor = true;
907  }
908  get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_smashes_tile>(
909  player_character.getID(), here.ter( smashp ).id(), here.furn( smashp ).id() );
910  if( player_character.is_mounted() ) {
911  monster *crit = player_character.mounted_creature.get();
912  if( crit->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
913  crit->use_mech_power( 3_kJ );
914  }
915  }
916  for( std::pair<const field_type_id, field_entry> &fd_to_smsh : here.field_at( smashp ) ) {
917  const map_bash_info &bash_info = fd_to_smsh.first->bash_info;
918  if( bash_info.str_min == -1 ) {
919  continue;
920  }
921  if( smashskill < bash_info.str_min && one_in( 10 ) ) {
922  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You don't seem to be damaging the %s." ), fd_to_smsh.first->get_name() );
923  return;
924  } else if( smashskill >= rng( bash_info.str_min, bash_info.str_max ) ) {
925  sounds::sound( smashp, bash_info.sound_vol, sounds::sound_t::combat, bash_info.sound, true, "smash",
926  "field" );
927  here.remove_field( smashp, fd_to_smsh.first );
928  here.spawn_items( smashp, item_group::items_from( bash_info.drop_group, calendar::turn ) );
929  player_character.mod_moves( - bash_info.fd_bash_move_cost );
930  add_msg( m_info, bash_info.field_bash_msg_success.translated() );
931  return;
932  } else {
933  sounds::sound( smashp, bash_info.sound_fail_vol, sounds::sound_t::combat, bash_info.sound_fail,
934  true, "smash",
935  "field" );
936  return;
937  }
938  }
939 
940  bool should_pulp = false;
941  for( const item &maybe_corpse : here.i_at( smashp ) ) {
942  if( maybe_corpse.is_corpse() && maybe_corpse.damage() < maybe_corpse.max_damage() &&
943  maybe_corpse.can_revive() ) {
944  if( maybe_corpse.get_mtype()->bloodType()->has_acid &&
945  !player_character.is_immune_field( fd_acid ) ) {
946  if( !query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to pulp an acid filled corpse?" ) ) ) {
947  return; // Player doesn't want an acid bath
948  }
949  }
950  should_pulp = true; // There is at least one corpse to pulp
951  }
952  }
953 
954  if( should_pulp ) {
955  // do activity forever. ACT_PULP stops itself
956  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_PULP, calendar::INDEFINITELY_LONG, 0 );
957  player_character.activity.placement = here.getglobal( smashp );
958  return; // don't smash terrain if we've smashed a corpse
959  }
960 
961  vehicle *veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( smashp ) );
962  if( veh != nullptr ) {
963  if( !veh->handle_potential_theft( player_character ) ) {
964  return;
965  }
966  }
967 
968  if( !player_character.has_weapon() ) {
969  const bodypart_id bp_null( "bp_null" );
970  std::pair<bodypart_id, int> best_part_to_smash = player_character.best_part_to_smash();
971  if( best_part_to_smash.first != bp_null && here.is_bashable( smashp ) ) {
972  std::string name_to_bash = _( "thing" );
973  if( here.is_bashable_furn( smashp ) ) {
974  name_to_bash = here.furnname( smashp );
975  } else if( here.is_bashable_ter( smashp ) ) {
976  name_to_bash = here.tername( smashp );
977  }
978  if( !best_part_to_smash.first->smash_message.empty() ) {
979  add_msg( best_part_to_smash.first->smash_message, name_to_bash );
980  } else {
981  add_msg( _( "You use your %s to smash the %s." ),
982  body_part_name_accusative( best_part_to_smash.first ), name_to_bash );
983  }
984  }
985  }
986 
987  const bash_params bash_result = here.bash( smashp, smashskill, false, false, smash_floor );
988  // Weariness scaling
989  float weary_mult = 1.0f;
990  item_location weapon = player_character.used_weapon();
991  if( bash_result.did_bash ) {
992  if( !mech_smash ) {
993  player_character.set_activity_level( MODERATE_EXERCISE );
994  player_character.handle_melee_wear( weapon );
995  weary_mult = 1.0f / player_character.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( MODERATE_EXERCISE );
996 
997  const int mod_sta = 2 * player_character.get_standard_stamina_cost();
998  player_character.burn_energy_arms( mod_sta );
999 
1000  if( static_cast<int>( player_character.get_skill_level( skill_melee ) ) == 0 ) {
1001  player_character.practice( skill_melee, rng( 0, 1 ) * rng( 0, 1 ) );
1002  }
1003  if( weapon ) {
1004  const int glass_portion = weapon->made_of( material_glass );
1005  float glass_fraction = glass_portion / static_cast<float>( weapon->type->mat_portion_total );
1006  if( std::isnan( glass_fraction ) || glass_fraction > 1.f ) {
1007  glass_fraction = 0.f;
1008  }
1009  const int vol = weapon->volume() * glass_fraction / units::legacy_volume_factor;
1010  if( glass_portion && rng( 0, vol + 3 ) < vol ) {
1011  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your %s shatters!" ), weapon->tname() );
1012  weapon->spill_contents( player_character.pos() );
1013  sounds::sound( player_character.pos(), 24, sounds::sound_t::combat, "CRACK!", true, "smash",
1014  "glass" );
1015  player_character.deal_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "hand_r" ), damage_instance( damage_cut,
1016  rng( 0,
1017  vol ) ) );
1018  if( vol > 20 ) {
1019  // Hurt left arm too, if it was big
1020  player_character.deal_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "hand_l" ), damage_instance( damage_cut,
1021  rng( 0,
1022  static_cast<int>( vol * .5 ) ) ) );
1023  }
1024  player_character.remove_weapon();
1025  player_character.check_dead_state();
1026  }
1027  }
1028  }
1029  player_character.mod_moves( -move_cost * weary_mult );
1030  player_character.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
1031 
1032  if( bash_result.success ) {
1033  // Bash results in destruction of target
1034  g->draw_async_anim( smashp, "bash_complete", "X", c_light_gray );
1035  } else if( smashskill >= here.bash_resistance( smashp ) ) {
1036  // Bash effective but target not yet destroyed
1037  g->draw_async_anim( smashp, "bash_effective", "/", c_light_gray );
1038  } else {
1039  // Bash not effective
1040  g->draw_async_anim( smashp, "bash_ineffective" );
1041  if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
1042  if( here.has_furn( smashp ) && here.furn( smashp ).obj().bash.str_min != -1 ) {
1043  // %s is the smashed furniture
1044  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You don't seem to be damaging the %s." ), here.furnname( smashp ) );
1045  } else {
1046  // %s is the smashed terrain
1047  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You don't seem to be damaging the %s." ), here.tername( smashp ) );
1048  }
1049  }
1050  }
1051 
1052  } else {
1053  add_msg( _( "There's nothing there to smash!" ) );
1054  }
1055 }
1056 
1057 static int try_set_alarm()
1058 {
1059  uilist as_m;
1060  const bool already_set = get_player_character().has_effect( effect_alarm_clock );
1061 
1062  as_m.text = already_set ?
1063  _( "You already have an alarm set. What do you want to do?" ) :
1064  _( "You have an alarm clock. What do you want to do?" );
1065 
1066  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 0, true, 'w', already_set ?
1067  _( "Keep the alarm and wait a while" ) :
1068  _( "Wait a while" ) );
1069  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 1, true, 'a', already_set ?
1070  _( "Change your alarm" ) :
1071  _( "Set an alarm for later" ) );
1072  as_m.query();
1073 
1074  return as_m.ret;
1075 }
1076 
1077 static void wait()
1078 {
1079  std::map<int, time_duration> durations;
1080  uilist as_m;
1081  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1082  bool setting_alarm = false;
1083  map &here = get_map();
1084 
1085  if( player_character.controlling_vehicle ) {
1086  const vehicle &veh = here.veh_at( player_character.pos() )->vehicle();
1087  if( !veh.can_use_rails() && ( // control optional if on rails
1088  veh.is_flying_in_air() || // control required: fuel is consumed even at hover
1089  veh.is_falling || // *not* vertical_velocity, which is only used for collisions
1090  veh.velocity || // is moving
1091  ( veh.cruise_velocity && ( // would move if it could
1092  ( veh.is_watercraft() && veh.can_float() ) || // is viable watercraft floating on water
1093  veh.sufficient_wheel_config() // is viable land vehicle on ground or fording shallow water
1094  ) ) ||
1095  ( veh.is_in_water( true ) && !veh.can_float() ) // is sinking in deep water
1096  ) ) {
1097  popup( _( "You can't pass time while controlling a moving vehicle." ) );
1098  return;
1099  }
1100  }
1101 
1102  if( player_character.has_alarm_clock() ) {
1103  int alarm_query = try_set_alarm();
1104  if( alarm_query == UILIST_CANCEL ) {
1105  return;
1106  }
1107  setting_alarm = alarm_query == 1;
1108  }
1109 
1110  const bool has_watch = player_character.has_watch() || setting_alarm;
1111 
1112  const auto add_menu_item = [ &as_m, &durations, has_watch ]
1113  ( int retval, int hotkey, const std::string &caption = "",
1114  const time_duration &duration = time_duration::from_turns( calendar::INDEFINITELY_LONG ) ) {
1115 
1116  std::string text( caption );
1117 
1118  if( has_watch && duration != time_duration::from_turns( calendar::INDEFINITELY_LONG ) ) {
1119  const std::string dur_str( to_string( duration ) );
1120  text += ( text.empty() ? dur_str : string_format( " (%s)", dur_str ) );
1121  }
1122  as_m.addentry( retval, true, hotkey, text );
1123  durations.emplace( retval, duration );
1124  };
1125 
1126  if( setting_alarm ) {
1127 
1128  add_menu_item( 0, '0', "", 30_minutes );
1129 
1130  for( int i = 1; i <= 9; ++i ) {
1131  add_menu_item( i, '0' + i, "", i * 1_hours );
1132  }
1133 
1134  } else {
1135  if( player_character.get_stamina() < player_character.get_stamina_max() ) {
1136  as_m.addentry( 14, true, 'w', _( "Wait until you catch your breath" ) );
1137  durations.emplace( 14, 15_minutes ); // to hide it from showing
1138  }
1139  add_menu_item( 1, '1', !has_watch ? _( "Wait 20 heartbeats" ) : "", 20_seconds );
1140  add_menu_item( 2, '2', !has_watch ? _( "Wait 60 heartbeats" ) : "", 1_minutes );
1141  add_menu_item( 3, '3', !has_watch ? _( "Wait 300 heartbeats" ) : "", 5_minutes );
1142  add_menu_item( 4, '4', !has_watch ? _( "Wait 1800 heartbeats" ) : "", 30_minutes );
1143 
1144  if( has_watch ) {
1145  add_menu_item( 5, '5', "", 1_hours );
1146  add_menu_item( 6, '6', "", 2_hours );
1147  add_menu_item( 7, '7', "", 3_hours );
1148  add_menu_item( 8, '8', "", 6_hours );
1149  }
1150  }
1151 
1152  if( here.get_abs_sub().z() >= 0 || has_watch ) {
1153  const time_point last_midnight = calendar::turn - time_past_midnight( calendar::turn );
1154  const auto diurnal_time_before = []( const time_point & p ) {
1155  // Either the given time is in the future (e.g. waiting for sunset while it's early morning),
1156  // than use it directly. Otherwise (in the past), add a single day to get the same time tomorrow
1157  // (e.g. waiting for sunrise while it's noon).
1158  const time_point target_time = p > calendar::turn ? p : p + 1_days;
1159  return target_time - calendar::turn;
1160  };
1161 
1162  add_menu_item( 9, 'd',
1163  setting_alarm ? _( "Set alarm for dawn" ) : _( "Wait till daylight" ),
1164  diurnal_time_before( daylight_time( calendar::turn ) ) );
1165  add_menu_item( 10, 'n',
1166  setting_alarm ? _( "Set alarm for noon" ) : _( "Wait till noon" ),
1167  diurnal_time_before( last_midnight + 12_hours ) );
1168  add_menu_item( 11, 'k',
1169  setting_alarm ? _( "Set alarm for dusk" ) : _( "Wait till night" ),
1170  diurnal_time_before( night_time( calendar::turn ) ) );
1171  add_menu_item( 12, 'm',
1172  setting_alarm ? _( "Set alarm for midnight" ) : _( "Wait till midnight" ),
1173  diurnal_time_before( last_midnight ) );
1174  if( setting_alarm ) {
1175  if( player_character.has_effect( effect_alarm_clock ) ) {
1176  add_menu_item( 13, 'x', _( "Cancel the currently set alarm." ),
1177  0_turns );
1178  }
1179  } else {
1180  add_menu_item( 13, 'W', _( "Wait till weather changes" ) );
1181  }
1182  }
1183 
1184  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-text-style): spaces required for concatenation
1185  as_m.text = has_watch ? string_format( _( "It's %s now. " ),
1186  to_string_time_of_day( calendar::turn ) ) : "";
1187  as_m.text += setting_alarm ? _( "Set alarm for when?" ) : _( "Wait for how long?" );
1188  as_m.query(); /* calculate key and window variables, generate window, and loop until we get a valid answer */
1189 
1190  const auto dur_iter = durations.find( as_m.ret );
1191  if( dur_iter == durations.end() ) {
1192  return;
1193  }
1194  const time_duration time_to_wait = dur_iter->second;
1195 
1196  if( setting_alarm ) {
1197  // Setting alarm
1198  player_character.remove_effect( effect_alarm_clock );
1199  if( as_m.ret == 13 ) {
1200  add_msg( _( "You cancel your alarm." ) );
1201  } else {
1202  player_character.add_effect( effect_alarm_clock, time_to_wait );
1203  add_msg( _( "You set your alarm." ) );
1204  }
1205 
1206  } else {
1207  // Waiting
1208  activity_id actType;
1209  if( as_m.ret == 13 ) {
1210  actType = ACT_WAIT_WEATHER;
1211  } else if( as_m.ret == 14 ) {
1212  actType = ACT_WAIT_STAMINA;
1213  } else {
1214  actType = ACT_WAIT;
1215  }
1216 
1217  player_activity new_act( actType, 100 * to_turns<int>( time_to_wait ), 0 );
1218 
1219  player_character.assign_activity( new_act );
1220  }
1221 }
1222 
1223 static void sleep()
1224 {
1225  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1226  if( player_character.is_mounted() ) {
1227  add_msg( m_info, _( "You cannot sleep while mounted." ) );
1228  return;
1229  }
1230 
1231  vehicle *const boat = veh_pointer_or_null( get_map().veh_at( player_character.pos() ) );
1232  if( get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, player_character.pos() ) &&
1233  !player_character.has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEPER ) &&
1234  !player_character.has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) &&
1235  !player_character.has_trait( trait_UNDINE_SLEEP_WATER ) &&
1236  boat == nullptr ) {
1237  add_msg( m_info, _( "You cannot sleep while swimming." ) );
1238  return;
1239  }
1240 
1241  uilist as_m;
1242  as_m.text = _( "<color_white>Are you sure you want to sleep?</color>" );
1243  // (Y)es/(S)ave before sleeping/(N)o
1244  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 0, true,
1245  get_option<bool>( "FORCE_CAPITAL_YN" ) ? 'Y' : 'y',
1246  _( "Yes." ) );
1247  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 1, g->get_moves_since_last_save(),
1248  get_option<bool>( "FORCE_CAPITAL_YN" ) ? 'S' : 's',
1249  _( "Yes, and save game before sleeping." ) );
1250  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 2, true,
1251  get_option<bool>( "FORCE_CAPITAL_YN" ) ? 'N' : 'n',
1252  _( "No." ) );
1253 
1254  // List all active items, bionics or mutations so player can deactivate them
1255  std::vector<std::string> active;
1256  for( item_location &it : player_character.all_items_loc() ) {
1257  if( it->has_flag( flag_LITCIG ) || ( it->active && it->ammo_sufficient( &player_character ) &&
1258  it->is_tool() && !it->has_flag( flag_SLEEP_IGNORE ) ) ) {
1259  active.push_back( it->tname() );
1260  }
1261  }
1262  for( int i = 0; i < player_character.num_bionics(); i++ ) {
1263  const bionic &bio = player_character.bionic_at_index( i );
1264  if( !bio.powered ) {
1265  continue;
1266  }
1267 
1268  // some bionics
1269  // bio_alarm is useful for waking up during sleeping
1270  if( bio.info().has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_SLEEP_FRIENDLY" ) ) ) ) {
1271  continue;
1272  }
1273 
1274  const bionic_data &info = bio.info();
1275  if( info.power_over_time > 0_kJ ) {
1276  active.push_back( info.name.translated() );
1277  }
1278  }
1279  for( auto &mut : player_character.get_mutations() ) {
1280  const mutation_branch &mdata = mut.obj();
1281  if( mdata.cost > 0 && player_character.has_active_mutation( mut ) ) {
1282  active.push_back( player_character.mutation_name( mut ) );
1283  }
1284  }
1285 
1286  // check for deactivating any currently played music instrument.
1287  for( item *&item : player_character.inv_dump() ) {
1288  if( item->active && item->get_use( "musical_instrument" ) != nullptr ) {
1289  player_character.add_msg_if_player( _( "You stop playing your %s before trying to sleep." ),
1290  item->tname() );
1291  // deactivate instrument
1292  item->active = false;
1293  }
1294  }
1295 
1296  // ask for deactivation
1297  std::stringstream data;
1298  if( !active.empty() ) {
1299  as_m.selected = 2;
1300  data << as_m.text << std::endl;
1301  data << _( "You may want to extinguish or turn off:" ) << std::endl;
1302  data << " " << std::endl;
1303  for( auto &a : active ) {
1304  data << "<color_red>" << a << "</color>" << std::endl;
1305  }
1306  as_m.text = data.str();
1307  }
1308 
1309  /* Calculate key and window variables, generate window,
1310  and loop until we get a valid answer. */
1311  as_m.query();
1312 
1313  if( as_m.ret == 1 ) {
1314  g->quicksave();
1315  } else if( as_m.ret == 2 || as_m.ret < 0 ) {
1316  return;
1317  }
1318 
1319  time_duration try_sleep_dur = 24_hours;
1320  std::string deaf_text;
1321  if( player_character.is_deaf() && !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_ALARMCLOCK ) ) {
1322  deaf_text = _( "<color_c_red> (DEAF!)</color>" );
1323  }
1324  if( player_character.has_alarm_clock() ) {
1325  /* Reuse menu to ask player whether they want to set an alarm. */
1326  bool can_hibernate = player_character.get_hunger() < -60 &&
1327  player_character.has_active_mutation( trait_HIBERNATE );
1328 
1329  as_m.reset();
1330  as_m.text = can_hibernate ?
1331  _( "You're engorged to hibernate. The alarm would only attract attention. "
1332  "Set an alarm anyway?" ) :
1333  _( "You have an alarm clock. Set an alarm?" );
1334  as_m.text += deaf_text;
1335 
1336  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 0, true,
1337  get_option<bool>( "FORCE_CAPITAL_YN" ) ? 'N' : 'n',
1338  _( "No, don't set an alarm." ) );
1339 
1340  for( int i = 3; i <= 9; ++i ) {
1341  as_m.entries.emplace_back( i, true, '0' + i,
1342  string_format( _( "Set alarm to wake up in %i hours." ), i ) + deaf_text );
1343  }
1344 
1345  as_m.query();
1346  if( as_m.ret >= 3 && as_m.ret <= 9 ) {
1347  player_character.add_effect( effect_alarm_clock, 1_hours * as_m.ret );
1348  try_sleep_dur = 1_hours * as_m.ret + 1_turns;
1349  } else if( as_m.ret < 0 ) {
1350  return;
1351  }
1352  }
1353 
1354  player_character.set_moves( 0 );
1355  player_character.try_to_sleep( try_sleep_dur );
1356 }
1357 
1358 static void loot()
1359 {
1360  enum ZoneFlags {
1361  None = 1,
1362  SortLoot = 2,
1363  SortLootStatic = 4,
1364  SortLootPersonal = 8,
1365  FertilizePlots = 16,
1366  ConstructPlots = 64,
1367  MultiFarmPlots = 128,
1368  Multichoptrees = 256,
1369  Multichopplanks = 512,
1370  Multideconvehicle = 1024,
1371  Multirepairvehicle = 2048,
1372  MultiButchery = 4096,
1373  MultiMining = 8192,
1374  MultiDis = 16384,
1375  MultiMopping = 32768,
1376  UnloadLoot = 65536
1377  };
1378 
1379  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1380  int flags = 0;
1381  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
1382  const bool has_fertilizer = player_character.cache_has_item_with( flag_FERTILIZER );
1383 
1384  // reset any potentially disabled zones from a past activity
1385  mgr.reset_disabled();
1386 
1387  // cache should only happen if we have personal zones defined
1388  if( mgr.has_personal_zones() ) {
1389  mgr.cache_data();
1390  }
1391 
1392  // Manually update vehicle cache.
1393  // In theory this would be handled by the related activity (activity_on_turn_move_loot())
1394  // but with a stale cache we never get that far.
1395  mgr.cache_vzones();
1396 
1397  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_LOOT_UNSORTED,
1398  player_character.pos() ) ? SortLoot : 0;
1399  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL, player_character.pos() ) ||
1400  g->check_near_zone( zone_type_STRIP_CORPSES, player_character.pos() ) ? UnloadLoot : 0;
1401  if( g->check_near_zone( zone_type_FARM_PLOT, player_character.pos() ) ) {
1402  flags |= FertilizePlots;
1403  flags |= MultiFarmPlots;
1404  }
1405  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_CONSTRUCTION_BLUEPRINT,
1406  player_character.pos() ) ? ConstructPlots : 0;
1407 
1408  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_CHOP_TREES,
1409  player_character.pos() ) ? Multichoptrees : 0;
1410  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_LOOT_WOOD,
1411  player_character.pos() ) ? Multichopplanks : 0;
1412  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCT,
1413  player_character.pos() ) ? Multideconvehicle : 0;
1414  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_VEHICLE_REPAIR,
1415  player_character.pos() ) ? Multirepairvehicle : 0;
1416  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_LOOT_CORPSE,
1417  player_character.pos() ) ? MultiButchery : 0;
1418  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_MINING, player_character.pos() ) ? MultiMining : 0;
1419  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_DISASSEMBLE,
1420  player_character.pos() ) ? MultiDis : 0;
1421  flags |= g->check_near_zone( zone_type_MOPPING, player_character.pos() ) ? MultiMopping : 0;
1422  if( flags == 0 ) {
1423  add_msg( m_info, _( "There is no compatible zone nearby." ) );
1424  add_msg( m_info, _( "Compatible zones are %s and %s" ),
1425  mgr.get_name_from_type( zone_type_LOOT_UNSORTED ),
1426  mgr.get_name_from_type( zone_type_FARM_PLOT ) );
1427  return;
1428  }
1429 
1430  uilist menu;
1431  menu.text = _( "Pick action:" );
1432  menu.desc_enabled = true;
1433 
1434  if( flags & SortLoot ) {
1435  menu.addentry_desc( SortLootStatic, true, 'o', _( "Sort out my loot (static zones only)" ),
1436  _( "Sorts out the loot from Loot: Unsorted zone to nearby appropriate Loot zones ignoring personal zones. Uses empty space in your inventory or utilizes a cart, if you are holding one." ) );
1437  menu.addentry_desc( SortLootPersonal, true, 'O', _( "Sort out my loot (personal zones only)" ),
1438  _( "Sorts out the loot from Loot: Unsorted zone to nearby appropriate Loot zones ignoring static zones. Uses empty space in your inventory or utilizes a cart, if you are holding one." ) );
1439  menu.addentry_desc( SortLoot, true, 'I', _( "Sort out my loot (all)" ),
1440  _( "Sorts out the loot from Loot: Unsorted zone to nearby appropriate Loot zones. Uses empty space in your inventory or utilizes a cart, if you are holding one." ) );
1441  }
1442 
1443  if( flags & UnloadLoot ) {
1444  menu.addentry_desc( UnloadLoot, true, 'U', _( "Unload nearby containers" ),
1445  _( "Unloads any corpses or containers that are in their respective zones." ) );
1446  }
1447 
1448  if( flags & FertilizePlots ) {
1449  menu.addentry_desc( FertilizePlots, has_fertilizer, 'f',
1450  !has_fertilizer ? _( "Fertilize plots… you don't have any fertilizer" ) : _( "Fertilize plots" ),
1451  _( "Fertilize any nearby Farm: Plot zones." ) );
1452  }
1453 
1454  if( flags & ConstructPlots ) {
1455  menu.addentry_desc( ConstructPlots, true, 'c', _( "Construct plots" ),
1456  _( "Work on any nearby Blueprint: construction zones." ) );
1457  }
1458  if( flags & MultiFarmPlots ) {
1459  menu.addentry_desc( MultiFarmPlots, true, 'm', _( "Farm plots" ),
1460  _( "Till and plant on any nearby farm plots - auto-fetch seeds and tools." ) );
1461  }
1462  if( flags & Multichoptrees ) {
1463  menu.addentry_desc( Multichoptrees, true, 'C', _( "Chop trees" ),
1464  _( "Chop down any trees in the designated zone - auto-fetch tools." ) );
1465  }
1466  if( flags & Multichopplanks ) {
1467  menu.addentry_desc( Multichopplanks, true, 'P', _( "Chop planks" ),
1468  _( "Auto-chop logs in wood loot zones into planks - auto-fetch tools." ) );
1469  }
1470  if( flags & Multideconvehicle ) {
1471  menu.addentry_desc( Multideconvehicle, true, 'v', _( "Deconstruct vehicle" ),
1472  _( "Auto-deconstruct vehicle in designated zone - auto-fetch tools." ) );
1473  }
1474  if( flags & Multirepairvehicle ) {
1475  menu.addentry_desc( Multirepairvehicle, true, 'V', _( "Repair vehicle" ),
1476  _( "Auto-repair vehicle in designated zone - auto-fetch tools." ) );
1477  }
1478  if( flags & MultiButchery ) {
1479  menu.addentry_desc( MultiButchery, true, 'B', _( "Butcher corpses" ),
1480  _( "Auto-butcher anything in corpse loot zones - auto-fetch tools." ) );
1481  }
1482  if( flags & MultiMining ) {
1483  menu.addentry_desc( MultiMining, true, 'M', _( "Mine Area" ),
1484  _( "Auto-mine anything in mining zone - auto-fetch tools." ) );
1485  }
1486  if( flags & MultiDis ) {
1487  menu.addentry_desc( MultiDis, true, 'D', _( "Disassemble items" ),
1488  _( "Auto-disassemble anything in disassembly zone - auto-fetch tools." ) );
1489 
1490  }
1491  if( flags & MultiMopping ) {
1492  menu.addentry_desc( MultiMopping, true, 'p', _( "Mop area" ), _( "Mop clean the area." ) );
1493  }
1494 
1495  menu.query();
1496  flags = ( menu.ret >= 0 ) ? menu.ret : None;
1497  bool recache = false;
1498 
1499  switch( flags ) {
1500  case None:
1501  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
1502  break;
1503  case SortLoot:
1504  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MOVE_LOOT );
1505  break;
1506  case SortLootStatic:
1507  //temporarily disable personal zones
1508  for( const auto &i : mgr.get_zones() ) {
1509  zone_data &zone = i.get();
1510  if( zone.get_is_personal() && zone.get_enabled() ) {
1511  zone.set_enabled( false );
1512  zone.set_temporary_disabled( true );
1513  recache = true;
1514  }
1515  }
1516  if( recache ) {
1517  mgr.cache_data();
1518  }
1519  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MOVE_LOOT );
1520  break;
1521  case SortLootPersonal:
1522  //temporarily disable non personal zones
1523  for( const auto &i : mgr.get_zones() ) {
1524  zone_data &zone = i.get();
1525  if( !zone.get_is_personal() && zone.get_enabled() ) {
1526  zone.set_enabled( false );
1527  zone.set_temporary_disabled( true );
1528  recache = true;
1529  }
1530  }
1531  if( recache ) {
1532  mgr.cache_data();
1533  }
1534  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MOVE_LOOT );
1535  break;
1536  case UnloadLoot:
1537  player_character.assign_activity( unload_loot_activity_actor() );
1538  break;
1539  case FertilizePlots:
1540  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_FERTILIZE_PLOT );
1541  break;
1542  case ConstructPlots:
1543  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION );
1544  break;
1545  case MultiFarmPlots:
1546  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MULTIPLE_FARM );
1547  break;
1548  case Multichoptrees:
1549  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES );
1550  break;
1551  case Multichopplanks:
1552  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_PLANKS );
1553  break;
1554  case Multideconvehicle:
1555  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION );
1556  break;
1557  case Multirepairvehicle:
1558  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_VEHICLE_REPAIR );
1559  break;
1560  case MultiButchery:
1561  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER );
1562  break;
1563  case MultiMining:
1564  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MULTIPLE_MINE );
1565  break;
1566  case MultiDis:
1567  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MULTIPLE_DIS );
1568  break;
1569  case MultiMopping:
1570  player_character.assign_activity( ACT_MULTIPLE_MOP );
1571  break;
1572  default:
1573  debugmsg( "Unsupported flag" );
1574  break;
1575  }
1576 }

1590 static void takeoff()
1591 {
1592  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1593  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::take_off( player_character );
1594 
1595  if( loc ) {
1596  player_character.takeoff( loc.obtain( player_character ) );
1597  } else {
1598  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
1599  }
1600 }
1601 
1602 static void read()
1603 {
1604  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1605  // Can read items from inventory or within one tile (including in vehicles)
1606  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::read( player_character );
1607 
1608  if( loc ) {
1609  if( loc->type->can_use( "learn_spell" ) ) {
1610  item spell_book = *loc.get_item();
1611  spell_book.get_use( "learn_spell" )->call( &player_character, spell_book,
1612  player_character.pos() );
1613  } else {
1614  loc = loc.obtain( player_character );
1615  player_character.read( loc );
1616  }
1617  } else {
1618  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
1619  }
1620 }

1622 // Perform a reach attach using wielded weapon
1623 static void reach_attack( avatar &you )
1624 {
1625  g->temp_exit_fullscreen();
1626 
1627  target_handler::trajectory traj = target_handler::mode_reach( you, you.get_wielded_item() );
1628 
1629  if( !traj.empty() ) {
1630  you.reach_attack( traj.back() );
1631  }
1632  g->reenter_fullscreen();
1633 }

1635 static void fire()
1636 {
1637  avatar &you = get_avatar();
1638  map &here = get_map();
1639 
1640  if( !you.try_break_relax_gas( _( "Your willpower asserts itself, and so do you!" ),
1641  _( "You're too pacified to strike anything…" ) ) ) {
1642  return;
1643  }
1644 
1645  const item_location weapon = you.get_wielded_item();
1646  // try reach weapon
1647  if( weapon && !weapon->is_gun() && weapon->current_reach_range( you ) > 1 ) {
1648  reach_attack( you );
1649  return;
1650  }
1651  if( you.has_trait( trait_BRAWLER ) ) {
1652  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You refuse to use ranged weapons." ) );
1653  return;
1654  }
1655  // try firing gun
1656  if( weapon && weapon->is_gun() && !weapon->gun_current_mode().melee() ) {
1657  avatar_action::fire_wielded_weapon( you );
1658  return;
1659  }
1660  // try firing turrets
1661  if( const optional_vpart_position ovp = here.veh_at( you.pos() ) ) {
1662  if( turret_data turret_here = ovp->vehicle().turret_query( you.pos() ) ) {
1663  if( avatar_action::fire_turret_manual( you, here, turret_here ) ) {
1664  return;
1665  }
1666  } else if( ovp.part_with_feature( VPFLAG_CONTROLS, true ) ) {
1667  if( ovp->vehicle().turrets_aim_and_fire_all_manual() ) {
1668  return;
1669  }
1670  }
1671  }
1672  // offer to draw a gun from worn holster
1673  std::vector<std::string> options;
1674  std::vector<std::function<void()>> actions;
1675  you.worn.fire_options( you, options, actions );
1676  if( !options.empty() ) {
1677  int sel = uilist( _( "Draw what?" ), options );
1678  if( sel >= 0 ) {
1679  actions[sel]();
1680  return;
1681  }
1682  }
1683 }

1685 static void open_movement_mode_menu()
1686 {
1687  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1688  const std::vector<move_mode_id> &modes = move_modes_by_speed();
1689  const int cycle = 1027;
1690  uilist as_m;
1691 
1692  as_m.text = _( "Change to which movement mode?" );
1693 
1694  for( size_t i = 0; i < modes.size(); ++i ) {
1695  const move_mode_id &curr = modes[i];
1696  as_m.entries.emplace_back( static_cast<int>( i ), player_character.can_switch_to( curr ),
1697  curr->letter(),
1698  curr->name() );
1699  }
1700  as_m.entries.emplace_back( cycle,
1701  player_character.can_switch_to( player_character.current_movement_mode()->cycle() ),
1702  hotkey_for_action( ACTION_OPEN_MOVEMENT, /*maximum_modifier_count=*/1 ),
1703  _( "Cycle move mode" ) );
1704  // This should select the middle move mode
1705  as_m.selected = std::floor( modes.size() / 2 );
1706  as_m.query();
1707 
1708  if( as_m.ret != UILIST_CANCEL ) {
1709  if( as_m.ret == cycle ) {
1710  player_character.cycle_move_mode();
1711  } else {
1712  player_character.set_movement_mode( modes[as_m.ret] );
1713  }
1714  }
1715 }

1717 static void cast_spell()
1718 {
1719  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1720  player_character.magic->clear_opens_spellbook_data();
1721  get_event_bus().send<event_type::opens_spellbook>( player_character.getID() ); // trigger EoC
1722  player_character.magic->evaluate_opens_spellbook_data();
1723  std::vector<spell_id> spells = player_character.magic->spells();
1724 
1725  if( spells.empty() ) {
1726  add_msg( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
1727  _( "You don't know any spells to cast." ) );
1728  return;
1729  }
1730 
1731  bool can_cast_spells = false;
1732  for( const spell_id &sp : spells ) {
1733  spell &temp_spell = player_character.magic->get_spell( sp );
1734  if( temp_spell.can_cast( player_character ) ) {
1735  can_cast_spells = true;
1736  }
1737  }
1738 
1739  if( !can_cast_spells ) {
1740  if( player_character.has_flag( json_flag_NO_SPELLCASTING ) &&
1741  !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_NO_PSIONICS ) ) {
1742  add_msg( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
1743  _( "You can't cast any of the spells you know!" ) );
1744  } else if( !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_NO_SPELLCASTING ) &&
1745  player_character.has_flag( json_flag_NO_PSIONICS ) ) {
1746  add_msg( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
1747  _( "You can't channel any of the powers you know!" ) );
1748  } else {
1749  add_msg( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
1750  _( "You can't use any of your powers!" ) );
1751  }
1752  }
1753 
1754  const int spell_index = player_character.magic->select_spell( player_character );
1755  if( spell_index < 0 ) {
1756  return;
1757  }
1758 
1759  spell &sp = *player_character.magic->get_spells()[spell_index];
1760 
1761  player_character.cast_spell( sp, false, std::nullopt );
1762 }
1763 
1764 // returns true if the spell was assigned
1765 bool Character::cast_spell( spell &sp, bool fake_spell,
1766  const std::optional<tripoint> &target = std::nullopt )
1767 {
1768  if( is_armed() && !sp.no_hands() && !has_flag( json_flag_SUBTLE_SPELL ) &&
1769  !get_wielded_item()->has_flag( flag_MAGIC_FOCUS ) && !sp.check_if_component_in_hand( *this ) ) {
1770  add_msg( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
1771  _( "You need your hands free to cast this spell!" ) );
1772  return false;
1773  }
1774 
1775  if( !magic->has_enough_energy( *this, sp ) ) {
1776  add_msg( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
1777  _( "You don't have enough %s to cast the spell." ),
1778  sp.energy_string() );
1779  return false;
1780  }
1781 
1782  if( !sp.no_hands() && !has_flag( json_flag_SUBTLE_SPELL ) &&
1783  has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
1784  add_msg( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
1785  _( "You can't focus enough to cast spell." ) );
1786  return false;
1787  }
1788 
1789  if( sp.energy_source() == magic_energy_type::hp && !has_quality( qual_CUT ) ) {
1790  add_msg( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
1791  _( "You cannot cast Blood Magic without a cutting implement." ) );
1792  return false;
1793  }
1794 
1795  player_activity spell_act( ACT_SPELLCASTING, sp.casting_time( *this ) );
1796  // [0] this is used as a spell level override for items casting spells
1797  if( fake_spell ) {
1798  spell_act.values.emplace_back( sp.get_level() );
1799  } else {
1800  spell_act.values.emplace_back( -1 );
1801  }
1802  // [1] if this value is 1, the spell never fails
1803  spell_act.values.emplace_back( 0 );
1804  // [2] this value overrides the mana cost if set to 0
1805  spell_act.values.emplace_back( 1 );
1806  spell_act.name = sp.id().c_str();
1807  if( magic->casting_ignore ) {
1808  const std::vector<distraction_type> ignored_distractions = {
1809  distraction_type::noise,
1810  distraction_type::pain,
1811  distraction_type::attacked,
1812  distraction_type::hostile_spotted_near,
1813  distraction_type::hostile_spotted_far,
1814  distraction_type::talked_to,
1815  distraction_type::asthma,
1816  distraction_type::motion_alarm,
1817  distraction_type::weather_change,
1818  distraction_type::mutation
1819  };
1820  for( const distraction_type ignored : ignored_distractions ) {
1821  spell_act.ignore_distraction( ignored );
1822  }
1823  }
1824  if( target ) {
1825  spell_act.coords.emplace_back( get_map().getabs( *target ) );
1826  }
1827  assign_activity( spell_act );
1828  return true;
1829 }
1830 
1831 // this is here because it shares some things in common with cast_spell
1832 bool bionic::activate_spell( Character &caster ) const
1833 {
1834  if( !caster.is_avatar() || !id->spell_on_activate ) {
1835  // the return value tells us if the spell fails. if it has no spell it can't fail
1836  return true;
1837  }
1838  spell sp = id->spell_on_activate->get_spell( caster );
1839  return caster.cast_spell( sp, true );
1840 }

1873 static void handle_debug_mode()
1874 {
1875  auto debug_mode_setup = []( uilist_entry & entry ) -> void {
1876  entry.txt = string_format( _( "Debug Mode (%1$s)" ), debug_mode ? _( "ON" ) : _( "OFF" ) );
1877  entry.text_color = debug_mode ? c_green : c_light_gray;
1878  };
1879 
1880  // returns if entry became active
1881  auto debugmode_entry_setup = []( uilist_entry & entry, bool active ) -> void {
1882  if( active )
1883  {
1884  entry.extratxt.txt = _( "A" );
1885  entry.extratxt.color = c_white_green;
1886  entry.text_color = c_green;
1887  } else
1888  {
1889  entry.extratxt.txt = " ";
1890  entry.extratxt.color = c_unset;
1891  entry.text_color = c_light_gray;
1892  }
1893  };
1894 
1895  static bool first_time = true;
1896  if( first_time ) {
1897  first_time = false;
1898  debugmode::enabled_filters.clear();
1899  for( int i = 0; i < debugmode::DF_LAST; ++i ) {
1900  debugmode::enabled_filters.emplace( static_cast<debugmode::debug_filter>( i ) );
1901  }
1902  }
1903 
1904  input_context ctxt( "DEFAULTMODE" );
1905  ctxt.register_action( "debug_mode" );
1906 
1907  uilist dbmenu;
1908  dbmenu.allow_anykey = true;
1909  dbmenu.title = _( "Debug Mode Filters" );
1910  dbmenu.text = string_format( _( "Press [%1$s] to quickly toggle debug mode." ),
1911  ctxt.get_desc( "debug_mode" ) );
1912 
1913  dbmenu.entries.reserve( 1 + debugmode::DF_LAST );
1914 
1915  dbmenu.addentry( 0, true, 'd', " " );
1916  debug_mode_setup( dbmenu.entries[0] );
1917 
1918  dbmenu.addentry( 1, true, 't', _( "Toggle all filters" ) );
1919  bool toggle_value = true;
1920 
1921  for( int i = 0; i < debugmode::DF_LAST; ++i ) {
1922  uilist_entry entry( i + 2, true, 0,
1923  debugmode::filter_name( static_cast<debugmode::debug_filter>( i ) ) );
1924 
1925  entry.extratxt.left = 1;
1926 
1927  const bool active = debugmode::enabled_filters.count( static_cast<debugmode::debug_filter>
1928  ( i ) ) == 1;
1929 
1930  if( toggle_value && active ) {
1931  toggle_value = false;
1932  }
1933 
1934  debugmode_entry_setup( entry, active );
1935  dbmenu.entries.push_back( entry );
1936  }
1937 
1938  do {
1939  dbmenu.query();
1940  if( ctxt.input_to_action( dbmenu.ret_evt ) == "debug_mode" ) {
1941  debug_mode = !debug_mode;
1942  if( debug_mode ) {
1943  add_msg( m_info, _( "Debug mode ON!" ) );
1944  } else {
1945  add_msg( m_info, _( "Debug mode OFF!" ) );
1946  }
1947  break;
1948  }
1949 
1950  if( dbmenu.ret == 0 ) {
1951  debug_mode = !debug_mode;
1952  debug_mode_setup( dbmenu.entries[0] );
1953 
1954  } else if( dbmenu.ret == 1 ) {
1955  debugmode::enabled_filters.clear();
1956 
1957  for( int i = 0; i < debugmode::DF_LAST; ++i ) {
1958  debugmode_entry_setup( dbmenu.entries[i + 2], toggle_value );
1959 
1960  if( toggle_value ) {
1961  debugmode::enabled_filters.emplace( static_cast<debugmode::debug_filter>( i ) );
1962  }
1963  }
1964 
1965  toggle_value = !toggle_value;
1966 
1967  } else if( dbmenu.ret > 1 ) {
1968  uilist_entry &entry = dbmenu.entries[dbmenu.ret];
1969 
1970  const auto filter_iter = debugmode::enabled_filters.find( static_cast<debugmode::debug_filter>
1971  ( dbmenu.ret - 2 ) );
1972 
1973  const bool active = filter_iter != debugmode::enabled_filters.end();
1974 
1975  debugmode_entry_setup( entry, !active );
1976 
1977  if( active ) {
1978  debugmode::enabled_filters.erase( filter_iter );
1979  } else {
1980  debugmode::enabled_filters.emplace(
1981  static_cast<debugmode::debug_filter>( dbmenu.ret - 2 ) );
1982  }
1983  }
1984  } while( dbmenu.ret != UILIST_CANCEL );
1985 }

1987 static bool has_vehicle_control( avatar &player_character )
1988 {
1989  if( player_character.is_dead_state() ) {
1990  return false;
1991  }
1992  const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( player_character.pos() );
1993  if( vp && vp->vehicle().player_in_control( player_character ) ) {
1994  return true;
1995  }
1996  return g->remoteveh() != nullptr;
1997 }

1999 static void do_deathcam_action( const action_id &act, avatar &player_character )
2000 {
2001  switch( act ) {
2002  case ACTION_TOGGLE_MAP_MEMORY:
2003  player_character.toggle_map_memory();
2004  break;
2005 
2006  case ACTION_CENTER:
2007  player_character.view_offset.x = g->driving_view_offset.x;
2008  player_character.view_offset.y = g->driving_view_offset.y;
2009  break;
2010 
2011  case ACTION_SHIFT_N:
2012  case ACTION_SHIFT_NE:
2013  case ACTION_SHIFT_E:
2014  case ACTION_SHIFT_SE:
2015  case ACTION_SHIFT_S:
2016  case ACTION_SHIFT_SW:
2017  case ACTION_SHIFT_W:
2018  case ACTION_SHIFT_NW: {
2019  static const std::map<action_id, std::pair<point, point>> shift_delta = {
2020  { ACTION_SHIFT_N, { point_north, point_north_east } },
2021  { ACTION_SHIFT_NE, { point_north_east, point_east } },
2022  { ACTION_SHIFT_E, { point_east, point_south_east } },
2023  { ACTION_SHIFT_SE, { point_south_east, point_south } },
2024  { ACTION_SHIFT_S, { point_south, point_south_west } },
2025  { ACTION_SHIFT_SW, { point_south_west, point_west } },
2026  { ACTION_SHIFT_W, { point_west, point_north_west } },
2027  { ACTION_SHIFT_NW, { point_north_west, point_north } },
2028  };
2029  int soffset = get_option<int>( "MOVE_VIEW_OFFSET" );
2030  player_character.view_offset += g->is_tileset_isometric()
2031  ? shift_delta.at( act ).second * soffset
2032  : shift_delta.at( act ).first * soffset;
2033  }
2034  break;
2035 
2036  case ACTION_LOOK:
2037  g->look_around();
2038  break;
2039 
2040  case ACTION_KEYBINDINGS: // already handled by input context
2041  default:
2042  break;
2043  }
2044 }

2111 bool game::do_regular_action( action_id &act, avatar &player_character,
2112  const std::optional<tripoint> &mouse_target )
2113 {
2114  item_location weapon = player_character.get_wielded_item();
2115  const bool in_shell = player_character.has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL2 )
2116  || player_character.has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL3 );
2117 
2118  const std::map<action_id, std::string> actions_disabled_mounted = get_actions_disabled_mounted();
2119  const std::map<action_id, std::string> actions_disabled_in_shell = get_actions_disabled_in_shell();
2120 
2121  if( in_shell && actions_disabled_in_shell.count( act ) > 0 ) {
2122  add_msg( m_info, actions_disabled_in_shell.at( act ) );
2123  return true;
2124  }
2125 
2126  if( u.has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) && actions_disabled_in_incorporeal.count( act ) > 0 ) {
2127  add_msg( m_info, _( "You lack the substance to affect anything." ) );
2128  return true;
2129  }
2130 
2131  if( player_character.is_mounted() && actions_disabled_mounted.count( act ) > 0 ) {
2132  add_msg( m_info, actions_disabled_mounted.at( act ) );
2133  return true;
2134  }
2135 
2136  switch( act ) {
2137  case ACTION_NULL: // dummy entry
2138  case NUM_ACTIONS: // dummy entry
2139  case ACTION_ACTIONMENU: // handled above
2140  case ACTION_MAIN_MENU:
2141  case ACTION_KEYBINDINGS:
2142  break;
2143 
2144  case ACTION_TIMEOUT:
2145  if( check_safe_mode_allowed( false ) ) {
2146  player_character.pause();
2147  }
2148  break;
2149 
2150  case ACTION_PAUSE:
2151  if( check_safe_mode_allowed() ) {
2152  player_character.pause();
2153  }
2154  break;
2155 
2156  case ACTION_CYCLE_MOVE:
2157  player_character.cycle_move_mode();
2158  break;
2159 
2160  case ACTION_CYCLE_MOVE_REVERSE:

2184  case ACTION_MOVE_FORTH:

2186  case ACTION_MOVE_RIGHT:
2187  case ACTION_MOVE_BACK_RIGHT:
2188  case ACTION_MOVE_BACK:
2189  case ACTION_MOVE_BACK_LEFT:
2190  case ACTION_MOVE_LEFT:
2191  case ACTION_MOVE_FORTH_LEFT:
2192  if( !player_character.get_value( "remote_controlling" ).empty() &&
2193  ( player_character.has_active_item( itype_radiocontrol ) ||
2194  player_character.has_active_bionic( bio_remote ) ) ) {
2195  rcdrive( get_delta_from_movement_action( act, iso_rotate::yes ) );
2196  } else if( has_vehicle_control( player_character ) ) {
2197  // vehicle control uses x for steering and y for ac/deceleration,
2198  // so no rotation needed
2199  pldrive( get_delta_from_movement_action( act, iso_rotate::no ) );
2200  } else {
2201  point dest_delta = get_delta_from_movement_action( act, iso_rotate::yes );
2202  if( auto_travel_mode && !player_character.is_auto_moving() ) {
2203  for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
2204  tripoint_bub_ms auto_travel_destination =
2205  player_character.pos_bub() + dest_delta * ( SEEX - i );
2206  destination_preview =
2207  m.route( player_character.pos_bub(), auto_travel_destination,
2208  player_character.get_pathfinding_settings(),
2209  player_character.get_path_avoid() );
2210  if( !destination_preview.empty() ) {
2211  destination_preview.erase(
2212  destination_preview.begin() + 1, destination_preview.end() );
2213  player_character.set_destination( destination_preview );
2214  break;
2215  }
2216  }
2217  act = player_character.get_next_auto_move_direction();
2218  const point dest_next = get_delta_from_movement_action( act, iso_rotate::yes );
2219  if( dest_next == point_zero ) {
2220  player_character.clear_destination();
2221  }
2222  dest_delta = dest_next;
2223  }
2224  if( !avatar_action::move( player_character, m, dest_delta ) ) {
2225  // auto-move should be canceled due to a failed move or obstacle
2226  player_character.clear_destination();
2227  }
2228 
2229  if( get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) && get_option<bool>( "AUTO_MOPPING" ) &&
2230  weapon && weapon->has_flag( json_flag_MOP ) ) {
2231  map &here = get_map();
2232  const bool is_blind = player_character.is_blind();
2233  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &point : here.points_in_radius( player_character.pos_bub(), 1 ) ) {
2234  bool did_mop = false;
2235  if( is_blind ) {
2236  // blind character have a 1/3 chance of actually mopping
2237  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
2238  did_mop = here.mop_spills( point );
2239  } else {
2240  did_mop = here.terrain_moppable( point );
2241  }
2242  } else {
2243  did_mop = here.mop_spills( point );
2244  }
2245  // iuse::mop costs 15 moves per use
2246  if( did_mop ) {
2247  player_character.mod_moves( -15 );
2248  }
2249  }
2250  }
2251  }
2252  break;
2253  case ACTION_MOVE_DOWN: {
2254  if( player_character.is_mounted() ) {
2255  auto *mon = player_character.mounted_creature.get();
2256  if( !mon->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
2257  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't go down stairs while you're riding." ) );
2258  break;
2259  }
2260  }
2261 
2262  if( has_vehicle_control( player_character ) ) {
2263  const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( player_character.pos() );
2264  if( vp->vehicle().is_rotorcraft() ) {
2265  pldrive( tripoint_below );
2266  break;
2267  }
2268  }
2269 
2270  if( !player_character.in_vehicle ) {
2271  // We're NOT standing on tiles with stairs, ropes, ladders etc
2272  if( !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, player_character.pos() ) ) {
2273  std::vector<tripoint> pts;
2274 
2275  // Check tiles around player character for open air
2276  for( const tripoint &p : m.points_in_radius( player_character.pos(), 1 ) ) {
2277  if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR, p ) ) {
2278  pts.push_back( p );
2279  }
2280  }
2281 
2282  // If we found tiles with open air, prompt player with query on direction they want to climb
2283  if( !pts.empty() ) {
2284  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = point_selection_menu( pts, false );
2285  if( !pnt ) {
2286  break;
2287  }
2288 
2289  // If player selected direction, climb down there, and exit from the whole ACTION_MOVE_DOWN case
2290  climb_down( *pnt );
2291  break;
2292  }
2293  }
2294 
2295  // If we're here, we might or might not be standing on tiles with stairs, ropes, ladders etc
2296  // In any case, attempt a descend
2297  vertical_move( -1, false );
2298  }
2299  break;
2300  }

2302  case ACTION_MOVE_UP:

2859  add_msg( _( "You will pick up also those things that belong to others!" ) );
2860  } else if( player_character.get_value( "THIEF_MODE" ) == "THIEF_STEAL" ) {
2861  player_character.set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
2862  player_character.set_value( "THIEF_MODE_KEEP", "NO" );
2863  //~ Thief mode cycled between THIEF_ASK/THIEF_HONEST/THIEF_STEAL
2864  add_msg( _( "You will be reminded not to steal." ) );
2865  } else {
2866  // ERROR
2867  add_msg( _( "THIEF_MODE CONTAINED BAD VALUE [ %s ]!" ),
2868  player_character.get_value( "THIEF_MODE" ) );
2869  }
